author: Ally Foster
title: Coronavirus: Trump’s weird suggestions to get rid of the virus

content: Donald Trump has made some suggestions on how to rid the body of the coronavirus, with the US President saying patients could be blasted with UV light or injected with disinfectant.Trump made these suggestions during a White House press briefing after William… [+4235 chars]
